name: Dark Way Home
description:
After a terrible battle your squadron is low on health and ammo, you're trying to run back to your ship, but this planet won't stop shifting.

I did this for Ludum Dare 41, but I didn't have time to finish it because I got too caught up making the visual effects (mainly the floor). It's meant to be a mix of horror and RTS, with some random generation thrown in. I didn't have time to code a multi selection, so it's kind of tedious to move the soldiers one by one (you can use the arrow keys but that's kinda bad)

You can technically make it to the ship, but it might not be fun.

ludum dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/dark-way-home
